Release Notes:

THUNDER Laughing On Judgement Day (2009 issue Expanded Edition 2-CD album set - Originally released in 1992. 'Laughing On Judgement Day' features the classic singles 'Low Life In High Places', 'Everybody Wants Her', 'A Better Man' & 'Like A Satellite'; this 2009 edition comes expanded with 15 Bonus Recordings including studio and live b-sides from the album's now rare and out of print singles. Complete with a picture booklet containing extensive sleevenotes by Classic Rock'sDave Ling and period memorabilia). 

Enjoy and please seed after you have finished download as long as you can.
